document.full_text: donald sutherland, who starred in 1973 film "don't look now," on thursday refuted an upcoming book's claim that he had sex on camera with co-star julie christie while filming a scene in the movie.
document.title: sutherland refutes claim of sex in "don't look now"
lines_and_colors: donald sutherland, who starred in 1973 film "don't look now," on thursday refuted an upcoming book's claim that he had sex on camera with co-star julie christie while filming a scene in the movie.
